HOME.DISCLAIMER: ZITADEL trata tus datos confidencialmente y de forma segura.

SHORTCUTS.REORDER: Mantén y arrastra el panel para moverlo
SHORTCUTS.ADD: Mantén y arrastre el panel para añadir

CARD.TITLE: Pon en marcha ZITADEL
CARD.DESCRIPTION: Esta lista de tareas te ayuda a configurar tu instancia y te guía por los pasos más esenciales

instance.policy.label.added.title: Configura tu marca
instance.policy.label.added.description: Define el esquema de colores, da forma a tu inicio de sesión y sube tu logo y tus iconos.

instance.smtp.config.added.title: Establece tu configuración SMTP
instance.smtp.config.added.description: Introduce la configuración de tu propio servidor de correo.

project.added.title: Crea tu primer proyecto
project.added.description: Añade tu primer proyecto y define sus roles y autorizaciones.

project.application.added.title: Crea tu primera aplicación
project.application.added.description: Crea una aplicación web, nativa, api o saml y configura tu flujo de autenticación.

user.human.added.title: Añade usuarios
user.human.added.description: Añade los usuarios de tu aplicación

user.grant.added.title: Concede permisos
user.grant.added.description: Permite a tus usuarios acceder a tu aplicación y configura su rol.

MENU.LOGOUT: Cerrar sesión de todos los usuarios
MENU.IAMADMIN: Eres un administrador IAM. Ten en cuenta que tienes permisos ampliados.
MENU.OPENSHORTCUTSTOOLTIP: Pulsa ? para mostrar los atajos de teclado

MEMBERROLES.IAM_OWNER: Tiene control sobre toda la instancia, incluyendo todas las organizaciones
MEMBERROLES.IAM_OWNER_VIEWER: Tiene permiso para revisar toda la instancia, incluyendo todas las organizaciones
MEMBERROLES.IAM_ORG_MANAGER: Tiene permiso para crear y gestionar organizaciones
MEMBERROLES.IAM_USER_MANAGER: Tiene permiso para crear y gestionar usuarios
MEMBERROLES.ORG_OWNER: Tiene permisos sobre toda la organización
MEMBERROLES.ORG_USER_MANAGER: Tiene permiso para crear y gestionar usuarios de la organización
MEMBERROLES.ORG_OWNER_VIEWER: TIene permiso para revisar toda la organización
MEMBERROLES.ORG_USER_PERMISSION_EDITOR: Tiene permiso para gestionar user grants
MEMBERROLES.ORG_PROJECT_PERMISSION_EDITOR: Tiene permiso para gestionar project grants
MEMBERROLES.ORG_PROJECT_CREATOR: Tiene permiso para crear sus propios proyectos and underlying settings
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_OWNER: Tiene permiso sobre todo el proyecto
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_OWNER_VIEWER: Tiene permiso para revisar todo el proyecto
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_OWNER_GLOBAL: Tiene permiso sobre todo el proyecto
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_OWNER_VIEWER_GLOBAL: Tiene permiso para revisar todo el proyecto
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_GRANT_OWNER: Tiene permiso para gestionar el project grant
MEMBERROLES.PROJECT_GRANT_OWNER_VIEWER: Tiene permiso para revisar el project grant

ORGSWITCHER.TEXT: All organization settings and tables in console are based on a selected organization. Click this button to switch organization or create a new one.

INSTANCE.TEXT: Haz clic aquí para obtener las configuraciones de instancia. Ten en cuenta que sólo tiene acceso a este butón si tiene permisos aumentados.

PROFILE.TEXT: Aquí puede cambiar entre tus cuentas de usuario y gestionar tus sesiones y perfil.

NAV.TEXT: This navigation changes based on your selected organization above or your instance

CONTEXTCHANGED.TEXT: ¡Atención! El contexto de la organización ha cambiado.

TOKENINVALID.TITLE: Tu token de autorización token ha caducado.
TOKENINVALID.DESCRIPTION: Haz clic en el botón más abajo para iniciar sesión otra vez.

ERRORS.NOTANEMAIL: El valor proporcionado no es una dirección de correo electrónico.
ERRORS.MINLENGTH: Debe tener al menos {{requiredLength}} caracteres de longitud.
ERRORS.UPPERCASEMISSING: Debe incluir un carácter en mayúscula.
ERRORS.LOWERCASEMISSING: Debe incluir un carácter en minúscula.
ERRORS.SYMBOLERROR: Debe incluir un símbolo o un signo de puntuación.
ERRORS.PHONE: El número de teléfono debe comenzar con 00 o +.

USER.TITLE: Información personal
USER.DESCRIPTION: Gestionar tu información y configuraciones de seguridad.

PAGES.TITLE: Usuario
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Crear nuevos usuarios en tu organización y gestionar el resto de organizaciones.
PAGES.DESCRIPTIONMACHINE: Create and manage Service Users of your organization
PAGES.LOCKEDDESCRIPTION: This user has been locked out due to exceeding the maximum login attempts and must be unlocked to be used again.
PAGES.DELETEACCOUNT_DESC: If you perform this action, you will be logged out and will no longer have access to your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Está a punto de borrar permanentemente un usuario. ¿Está seguro?
DIALOG.DELETE_SELF_DESCRIPTION: You are about to permanently delete your personal account. This will log you out and delete your user. This action cannot be undone!
DIALOG.DELETE_AUTH_DESCRIPTION: You are about to permanently delete your personal account. Are you sure?
DIALOG.TYPEUSERNAME: Type '{{value}}', to confirm and delete the user.

SENDEMAILDIALOG.TITLE: Send Email Notification
SENDEMAILDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Click the button below to send a notification to the current email address or change the email address in the field.

SECRETDIALOG.CLIENTSECRET_DESCRIPTION: Keep your client secret at a safe place as it will disappear once the dialog is closed.

PASSWORDLESS.NAME: Nombre
PASSWORDLESS.TITLE: Passwordless Authentication
PASSWORDLESS.DESCRIPTION: Add WebAuthn based Authentication Methods to log onto ZITADEL passwordless.
PASSWORDLESS.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: Manage the second factor methods of your users.
PASSWORDLESS.U2F_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for your used passwordless Login
PASSWORDLESS.U2F_ERROR: ¡Se ha producido un error durante la configuración!

TYPE.2: Fingerprint, Security Keys, Face ID and other

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete a passwordless Authentication method. Are you sure?
DIALOG.ADD_DESCRIPTION: Select one of the available options for creating a passwordless authentication method.
DIALOG.SEND_DESCRIPTION: Send yourself a registration link to your email address.
DIALOG.SENT: The email was successfully delivered. Check your mailbox to continue with the setup.
DIALOG.QRCODE_DESCRIPTION: Generate QR code for scanning with another device.
DIALOG.QRCODE_SCAN: Scan this QR code to continue with the setup on your device.
DIALOG.NEW_DESCRIPTION: Use this device to set up Passwordless.

MFA.NAME: Nombre
MFA.TITLE: Multifactor Authentication
MFA.DESCRIPTION: Add a second factor to ensure optimal security for your account.
MFA.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: Manage the second factor methods of your users.
MFA.OTP_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app and enter the code below to verify and activate the OTP method.
MFA.U2F: Fingerprint, Security Keys, Face ID and other
MFA.U2F_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Enter a name for your used universal Multifactor.

TYPE.2: Fingerprint, Security Keys, Face ID and other

DIALOG.MFA_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete a second factor. Are you sure?
DIALOG.ADD_MFA_DESCRIPTION: Select one of the following options.

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete an Identity Provider from a user. Do you really want to continue?

CREATE.TITLE: Crear un nuevo usuario
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Por favor, proporcione la información necesaria.
CREATE.INITMAILDESCRIPTION: Si ambas opciones se seleccionan, no email for initialization will be sent. If only one of the options is selected, a mail to provide / verify the data will be sent.

CODEDIALOG.TITLE: Verificar número de teléfono
CODEDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Introducir el código que has recibido por mensaje de texto para verificar tu número de teléfono.

PROFILE.TITLE: Perfil
PROFILE.PHONE_HINT: Use 00 or the + symbol followed by the calling country code, or select the country from the dropdown and finally enter the phone number
PROFILE.CHANGEUSERNAME_DESC: Enter the new name in the field below.

AVATAR.CROPPERERROR: An error while uploading your file occurred. Try a different format and size if necessary.

MACHINE.TITLE: Service User Details
MACHINE.NAME: Nombre
MACHINE.KEYSDESC: Define your keys and add an optional expiration date.
MACHINE.TOKENSDESC: Personal access tokens function like ordinary OAuth access tokens.

ADD.TITLE: Add Key
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Select your key type and choose an optional expiration date.

ADDED.TITLE: The key was created
ADDED.DESCRIPTION: Download the key as it won't be visible after closing this dialog!

DELETE_KEY.TITLE: Delete Key
DELETE_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Do you want to delete the selected key? This cannot be undone.

PASSWORD.TITLE: Contraseña
PASSWORD.LABEL: A secure password helps to protect the account
PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter the new password according to the policy below.
PASSWORD.MINLENGTHERROR: Debe tener al menos {{value}} caracteres de longitud.

USER.ISINITIAL: El usuario no está activo, aún.

LOGINMETHODS.TITLE: Información de contacto
LOGINMETHODS.DESCRIPTION: The provided information is used to send important information, like password reset e-mails to you.

EMAIL.TITLE: E-mail
EMAIL.ISVERIFIEDDESC: If the email is indicated as verified, no email verification request will be made.
EMAIL.EDITDESC: Enter the new email in the field below.

PHONE.TITLE: Teléfono
PHONE.RESEND: Reenviar mensaje de texto de verificación
PHONE.EDITDESC: Introduce el número de teléfono en el siguiente campo.
PHONE.DELETEDESC: Está seguro que quiere borrar el número de teléfono

GRANTS.TITLE: User Grants
GRANTS.DESCRIPTION: Grant this user access to certain projects

CREATE.TITLE: Create User Grant
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Search for the organization, the project and the corresponding project roles.

TARGET.SELF: If you want to grant a user of an other organization
TARGET.EXTERNAL: To grant a user of your organization

USER.SIGNEDOUT: You are signed out. Click the button "Sign In" to sign in again.

MEMBERSHIPS.TITLE: ZITADEL Manager Roles
MEMBERSHIPS.DESCRIPTION: These are all member grants of the user. You can modify them also on organization, project, or IAM detail pages.
MEMBERSHIPS.ORGCONTEXT: You see all organizations and projects that are related to the currently selected organization.
MEMBERSHIPS.USERCONTEXT: You see all organizations and projects to which you are authorized. Including other organizations.
MEMBERSHIPS.NOPERMISSIONTOEDIT: You are missing the required permissions to edit roles!

ADD.TITLE: Generar nuevo token de acceso personal
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Define a custom expiration for the token.

ADDED.TITLE: Token de acceso personal
ADDED.DESCRIPTION: Make sure to copy your personal access token. You won't be able to see it again!

DELETE.TITLE: Borrar token
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete the personal access token. Are you sure?

PERSONALACCESSTOKEN.DELETED: El token se borró con éxito.

METADATA.TITLE: Metadatos
METADATA.SETSUCCESS: El elemento se guardó con éxito
METADATA.REMOVESUCCESS: El elemento se borró con éxito

FLOWS.TITLE: Acciones y flujos
FLOWS.DESCRIPTION: Define scripts to execute on a certain event.
FLOWS.ACTIONSDESCRIPTION: These are your scripts that you can run in the flows.
FLOWS.FLOWSDESCRIPTION: Flows of a certain type execute actions at the time of a trigger.
FLOWS.NAME: Nombre
FLOWS.FLOWCHANGED: El flujo se cambió con éxito
FLOWS.FLOWCLEARED: El flujo se restableción con éxito
FLOWS.ACTIONSMAX: Based on your Tier, you have available a limited Number of Actions ({{value}}). Make sure to deactivate those you are not in need or consider upgrading your tier.

DELETEACTION.TITLE: ¿Borrar acción?
DELETEACTION.DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de borrar una acción. Esto no puede revertirse. ¿Estás seguro?
DELETEACTION.DELETE_SUCCESS: La acción se borró con éxito.

CLEAR.TITLE: Clear flow?
CLEAR.DESCRIPTION: You are about to reset the flow along with its triggers and actions. This change cannot be restored. Are you sure?

REMOVEACTIONSLIST.TITLE: ¿Borrar acciones seleccionadas?
REMOVEACTIONSLIST.DESCRIPTION: ¿Está seguro que quiere borrar las acciones seleccionadas del flujo?

IAM.TITLE: Instancia
IAM.DESCRIPTION: Manage your instance settings and Organizations

POLICIES.TITLE: System Policies and Access Settings
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION: Manage your global Policies and Management Access Settings.

EVENTSTORE.TITLE: IAM Storage Administration
EVENTSTORE.DESCRIPTION: Manage your ZITADEL views and failed events.

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: These Managers are allowed to make changes in your instance.

VIEWS.TITLE: Views
VIEWS.DESCRIPTION: This card shows your ZITADEL views.

DIALOG.VIEW_CLEAR_DESCRIPTION: You are about to clear a view. Clearing a view creates a process during which data is possibly not available for endusers. Are you really sure?

FAILEDEVENTS.TITLE: Eventos fallidos
FAILEDEVENTS.DESCRIPTION: This card shows your failed events.

EVENTS.TITLE: Eventos
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: This view shows all occured events.

PAGES.NAME: Nombre
PAGES.NOPERMISSION: You don't have the permission to access organization settings.
PAGES.USERSELFACCOUNT: Use your personal account as organization owner
PAGES.ORGDETAIL_TITLE: Enter the name and domain of your new organization.
PAGES.ORGDETAIL_TITLE_WITHOUT_DOMAIN: Enter the name of your new organization.

RENAME.TITLE: Renombrar organización
RENAME.DESCRIPTION: Introducir el nuevo nombre de tu organización

ORGDOMAIN.TITLE: Organization Domain Ownership Verification
ORGDOMAIN.VERIFICATION: To verify the ownership of your domain, you need to download a verification file and upload it at the provided URL listed below, or place a TXT Record DNS entry for the provided URL. To complete, click the button to verify.
ORGDOMAIN.VERIFICATION_SKIP: You can skip verification for now and continue to create your organization, but in order to use your organization this step has to be completed!
ORGDOMAIN.VERIFICATION_VALIDATION_DESC: The tokens are checked regularly to ensure you are still owner of the domain.
ORGDOMAIN.VERIFICATION_NEWTOKEN_DESC: If you want to request a new token, select you preferred method. If you want to validate a persisting token, click the button above.
ORGDOMAIN.VERIFICATION_VALIDATION_ONGOING: A verification token has already been requested. Click on the button to trigger a verification check.

PAGES.USEPASSWORDDESC: The user does not have to set the password during initialization.

LIST.TITLE: Organizaciones
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Estas son las organizaciones de tu instancia

DOMAINS.TITLE: Dominios
DOMAINS.DESCRIPTION: Configure your domains. This domain can be used to log in with your users.

DELETE.TITLE: Borrar dominio
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de borrar uno de tus dominios. Ten en cuenta que tus usuarios no podrán usar más este dominio para iniciar sesión.

ADD.TITLE: Añadir dominio
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de añadir un dominio para tu organización. Después de que se procese con éxito, tus usuarios serán capaces de usar el dominio para su inicio de sesión.

MEMBER.TITLE: Organization Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Definir los usuarios que podrán cambiar las preferencias de tu organización.

TOAST.UPDATED: La organización se actualizó con éxito.

DEACTIVATE.TITLE: Organización desactivada
DEACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: You are about to deactivate your organization. Users won't be able to login afterwards. Are you sure to proceed?

REACTIVATE.TITLE: Reactivar organización
REACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: You are about to reactivate your organization. Users will be able to login again. Are you sure to proceed?

DELETE.TITLE: Borrar organización
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de borrar tu organización. Esto inicia un proceso donde todos los datos de las organizaciones relacionadas serán borrados. No puedes revertir esta acción.

INSTANCE.TITLE: Instance Settings
INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: These settings will apply to all your organizations unless they have been overridden.

ORG.TITLE: Configuraciones de organización
ORG.DESCRIPTION: Estas configuraciones amplían y sobrescriben tus configuraciones de instancia.

SMTP.TITLE: SMTP Settings
SMTP.REQUIREDWARN: To send notifications from your domain, you have to enter your SMTP data.

SMS.TITLE: Configuración SMS
SMS.ADDPROVIDERDESCRIPTION: Choose one of the available providers and enter the required data.
SMS.REMOVEPROVIDER_DESC: You are about to delete a provider configuration. Do you want to continue?

SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: This setting sets the CSP to allow framing from a set of allowed domains. Note that by enabling the use of iFrames, you run the risk of allowing clickjacking.

RESET.DEFAULTDESCRIPTION: You are about to reset your settings to the default configuration of your instance. Are you sure you want to continue?
RESET.LOGINPOLICY_DESCRIPTION: Warning: If your continue, Identity Provider settings will be reset to the instance setting too.

POLICY.TITLE: Explore Settings
POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Pre-packaged settings that enhance your security.

PWD_COMPLEXITY.TITLE: Complejidad de contraseña
PWD_COMPLEXITY.DESCRIPTION: Ensures that all set passwords correspond to a specific pattern
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLANDNUMBERERROR: Must consist of a digit and a symbol/punctuation mark.
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLERROR: Debe inclur un símbolo/signo de puntuación.
PWD_COMPLEXITY.PATTERNERROR: The password does not meet the required pattern.

NOTIFICATION.TITLE: Notificación
NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Determina en qué cambios, se enviarán notificaciones.

PRIVATELABELING.TITLE: Imagen de marca
PRIVATELABELING.DESCRIPTION: Give the login your personalized style and modify its behavior.
PRIVATELABELING.PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Changes of the policy will automatically deployed to preview environment.
PRIVATELABELING.USEOFLOGO: Your Logo will be used in the Login as well as emails, while the icon is used for smaller UI elements like in the organization switcher in console
PRIVATELABELING.MAXSIZE: El tamaño máximo está limitado a 524kB
PRIVATELABELING.EMAILNOSVG: El formato de fichero SVG no está soportado en correos electrónicos. Therefore upload your logo in PNG or other supported format.
PRIVATELABELING.FONTINLOGINONLY: La fuente se muestra actualmente solo en la interfaz de inicio de sesión.

PREVIEW.TITLE: Inicio de sesión
PREVIEW.SECOND: iniciar sesión con tu cuenta ZITADEL.

PWD_AGE.TITLE: Password Aging
PWD_AGE.DESCRIPTION: You can set a policy for the aging of passwords. This policy emits a warning after the specific aging time has elapsed.

PWD_LOCKOUT.TITLE: Lockout Policy
PWD_LOCKOUT.DESCRIPTION: Set a maximum number of password-retries, after which accounts will be blocked.

PRIVATELABELING_POLICY.TITLE: Imagen de marca
PRIVATELABELING_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Personalizar la apariencia del inicio de sesión

LOGIN_POLICY.TITLE: Login Settings
LOGIN_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Define how Users can be authenticated and configure Identity Providers
LOGIN_POLICY.DESCRIPTIONCREATEADMIN: Users can choose from the available identity providers below.
LOGIN_POLICY.DESCRIPTIONCREATEMGMT: Users can choose from the available identity providers below. Note: You can use System-set providers as well as providers set for your organization only.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Política de privacidad y TDS
PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Set your Privacy Policy and Terms of Service Links
PRIVACY_POLICY.RESET_DESCRIPTION: You are about to restore the default Links for TOS and Privacy Policy. Do you really want to continue?

LOGIN_TEXTS.TITLE: Login Interface Texts
LOGIN_TEXTS.DESCRIPTION: Define your texts for the login interfaces. If texts are empty, the default Value shown as the placeholder will be used.
LOGIN_TEXTS.DESCRIPTION_SHORT: Define your texts for the login interfaces.
LOGIN_TEXTS.RESET_DESCRIPTION: You are about to restore all default values. All changes you have made will be permanently deleted. Do you really want to continue?
LOGIN_TEXTS.UNSAVED_DESCRIPTION: Your have made changes without saving. Do you want to save now?

MESSAGE_TEXTS.TITLE: Mensajes de texto
MESSAGE_TEXTS.DESCRIPTION: Define your texts for your notification mails.

POLICY.DEFAULTLABEL: The current settings corresponds to the standard of your Instance.

DATA.USERLOGINMUSTBEDOMAIN: Add organization domain as suffix to loginnames
DATA.USERLOGINMUSTBEDOMAIN_DESCRIPTION: If you enable this setting, all loginnames will be suffixed with the organization domain. If this settings is disabled, you have to ensure that usernames are unique over all organizations.
DATA.SMTPSENDERADDRESSMATCHESINSTANCEDOMAIN: SMTP Sender Address matches Instance Domain
DATA.ALLOWUSERNAMEPASSWORD_DESC: The conventional login with user name and password is allowed.
DATA.ALLOWEXTERNALIDP_DESC: The login is allowed for the underlying identity providers
DATA.ALLOWREGISTER_DESC: If the option is selected, an additional step for registering a user appears in the login.
DATA.FORCEMFA_DESC: If the option is selected, users have to configure a second factor for login.
DATA.HIDEPASSWORDRESET_DESC: If the option is selected, the user can't reset his password in the login process.
DATA.HIDELOGINNAMESUFFIX_DESC: Hides the login name suffix in the login interface
DATA.IGNOREUNKNOWNUSERNAMES_DESC: If the option is selected, the password screen will be displayed in the login process even if the user was not found. The error on the password check will not disclose if the username or password was wrong.
DATA.ALLOWDOMAINDISCOVERY_DESC: If the option is selected, the suffix (@domain.com) of an unknown username input on the login screen will be matched against the organization domains and will redirect to the registration of that organisation on success.
DATA.DEFAULTREDIRECTURI_DESC: Defines where the user will be redirected to if the login has started without an app context (e.g. from mail)
DATA.DISABLEWATERMARK_DESC: Hide Powered by ZITADEL watermark in the login interface

ORG_DETAIL.TITLE: Organización
ORG_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION: Aquí puede editar la configuración de tu organización y gestionar los miembros.

MEMBER.TITLE: Miembros
MEMBER.ADDDESCRIPTION: Introducir los nombres de los usuarios a añadir.

PAGES.TITLE: Proyecto
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can define applications, manage roles and grant other organizations to use your project.
PAGES.LISTDESCRIPTION: If you can't find a project, contact a project owner or someone with the corresponding rights to gain project access.
PAGES.CREATE_DESC: Insertar el nombre de tu proyecto.
PAGES.ZITADELPROJECT: This belongs to the ZITADEL project. Beware: If you make changes ZITADEL may not behave as intended.

0.TITLE: No especificado
0.DESC: As soon as the user is identified, the branding of the organization of the identified user will be shown, before the system default is shown.

1.TITLE: Use project setting
1.DESC: The branding of the organization which owns the project will be shown

2.TITLE: Use User Organization setting
2.DESC: The branding of the organization of the project will be shown, but as soon as the user is identified, the setting of the organization of the identified user, will be shown.

DIALOG.TITLE: Branding Setting
DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Select the behavior of the login, when using the project.

DELETE.TITLE: Borrar proyecto
DELETE.TYPENAME: Escribir el nombre del proyecto para borrarlo permanentemente.

PROJECT.NAME: Name

NAMEDIALOG.TITLE: Renombrar proyecto
NAMEDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Introducir el nuevo nombre de tu proyecto
NAMEDIALOG.NAME: Nuevo nombre

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.TITLEDESC: Managers can make changes to this project based on their role.
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: These managers may be able to edit your project.

GRANT.TITLE: Project Grants
GRANT.DESCRIPTION: Allow an other organization to use your project.

CREATE.TITLE: Create Organization Grant
CREATE.SEL_USERS: Select the users you wish to grant access
CREATE.SEL_ROLES: Select the roles you want to be added to the grant
CREATE.SEL_ORG_DESC: Enter the complete domain to specify the organization to grant.
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION: You are about to grant a user for the organization {{name}}.
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION_DESC: Switch the context in the header above to grant a user for another organization.

DETAIL.TITLE: Project Grant
DETAIL.DESC: You can select which roles can be used by the specified organization, and elect managers
DETAIL.MEMBERDESC: These are the managers of the granted organization. Add users here who should gain access to edit the data of the project.

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete a project grant. Are you sure?

ROLE.EMPTY: No role has been created yet.
ROLE.TITLE: Roles
ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Define some roles which can be used to create project-grants.
ROLE.NAME: Nombre
ROLE.ADDDESCRIPTION: Introducir los datos para el nuevo rol.
ROLE.EDITDESCRIPTION: Introducir los nuevos datos para el rol.
ROLE.SELECTGROUPTOOLTIP: Select all Roles of the group {{group}}.
ROLE.ASSERTION_DESCRIPTION: Role information is sent from Userinfo endpoint and depending on your application settings in tokens and other types.
ROLE.CHECK_DESCRIPTION: If set, users are only allowed to authenticate if any role is assigned to their account.

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de borrar un rol de proyecto. ¿Estás seguro?

PROJECT.HAS_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: It is checked whether the user's organization has this project. If not, the user cannot be authenticated.

DIALOG.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Estás a punto de borrar un rol. ¿Estás seguro?

LIST.TITLE: Identity Providers
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Manage your Identity Provider configuration, which can then be activated in your Login Settings.

CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Seleccionar uno o más de los siguientes proveedores.

OIDC.DESCRIPTION: Enter the required data for your OIDC provider.

JWT.DESCRIPTION: Enter the required data for your JWT provider.

GOOGLE.TITLE: Google Provider
GOOGLE.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your Google Identity Provider

GITLAB.TITLE: Gitlab Provider
GITLAB.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your Gitlab Identity Provider

GITLABSELFHOSTED.TITLE: Gitlab Self Hosted Provider
GITLABSELFHOSTED.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your Gitlab Self Hosted Identity Provider

GITHUBES.TITLE: GitHub Enterprise Server Provider
GITHUBES.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your GitHub Enterprise Server Identity Provider

GITHUB.TITLE: Github Provider
GITHUB.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your Github Identity Provider

AZUREAD.TITLE: Microsoft Provider
AZUREAD.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your Microsoft Identity Provider

LDAP.TITLE: Active Directory / LDAP
LDAP.DESCRIPTION: Enter the credentials for your LDAP Provider

OPTIONS.ISAUTOCREATION_DESC: If selected, an account will be created if it does not exist yet.
OPTIONS.ISAUTOUPDATE_DESC: If selected, accounts are updated on reauthentication.
OPTIONS.ISCREATIONALLOWED_DESC: Determines whether accounts can be created.
OPTIONS.ISLINKINGALLOWED_DESC: Determines whether an identity can be linked to an existing account.

IDP.NAMEHINT: If specified it will be shown in the login interface.
IDP.NAME: Nombre
IDP.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete an identity provider. The resulting changes are irrevocable. Do you really want to do this?
IDP.DELETE_SELECTION_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete an identity provider. The resulting changes are irrevocable. Do you really want to do this?

OIDC.TITLE: OIDC Configuration

PAGES.CREATE_NEW_PROJECT: or create a new one here.

2.DESC: Lee nuestra documentación acerca de crear aplicaciones o contactar con nuestro soporte

NAMEDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Introducir el nuevo nombre de tu app
NAMEDIALOG.NAME: Nuevo nombre

APP.NAME: Nombre
APP.ADDITIONALORIGINSDESC: If you want to add additional Origins to your app which is not used as a redirect you can do that here.
APP.NOTANORIGIN: El valor introducido no es un orígen

OIDC.WELLKNOWN: Further links can be retrieved from the discovery endpoint.
OIDC.REDIRECTTITLE: Specify the URIs where the login will redirect to.
OIDC.POSTREDIRECTTITLE: This is the redirect URI after logout.
OIDC.REDIRECTDESCRIPTIONWEB: Redirect URIs must begin with https://. http:// is only valid with enabled development mode.
OIDC.REDIRECTDESCRIPTIONNATIVE: Redirect URIs must begin with your own protocol, http://127.0.0.1, http://[::1] or http://localhost.
OIDC.REDIRECTNOTVALID: This redirect URI is not valid.
OIDC.TITLE: OIDC Configuration
OIDC.CLIENTSECRET_NOSECRET: With your chosen authentication flow, no secret is required and is therefore not available.
OIDC.CLIENTSECRET_DESCRIPTION: Keep your client secret at a safe place as it will disappear once the dialog is closed.
OIDC.DEVMODEDESC: Beware: With development mode enabled redirect URIs will not be validated.
OIDC.GRANTTITLE: Select your grant types. Note: Implicit is only available for browser-based applications.
OIDC.UNSECUREREDIRECT: Espero que sepas lo que estás haciendo.
OIDC.ACCESSTOKENROLEASSERTION: Añadir roles de usuario para el token de acceso
OIDC.ACCESSTOKENROLEASSERTION_DESCRIPTION: Si se selecciona, los roles solicitados para el usuario autenticado se añaden al token de acceso.
OIDC.IDTOKENROLEASSERTION: Roles de usuario dentro del Token de ID
OIDC.IDTOKENROLEASSERTION_DESCRIPTION: Si se selecciona, los roles solicitados para el usuario autenticado se añaden al token de ID.
OIDC.IDTOKENUSERINFOASSERTION: Información del usuario dentro del Token de ID
OIDC.IDTOKENUSERINFOASSERTION_DESCRIPTION: Permite a los clientes obtener los claims de perfil, correo electrónico, teléfono y dirección del token de ID.
OIDC.CLOCKSKEW: Enables clients to handle clock skew of OP and client. The duration (0-5s) will be added to exp claim and subtracted from iats, auth_time and nbf.

WEB.TITLE: Web
